workshoptitle: League of Legends Machine Learning with OCI - Model Building with scikit-learn and AutoGluon

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Data Sets
tutorials.description: In this section, we're going to observe the different types of datasets available to us and how to get access to them.

tutorials.title: Model Integration
tutorials.description: In this section, we'll create a simple scikit-learn classifier. We'll go into detail on how to achieve an ML model from scratchch for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
